short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect to Database Selector/Manager Odoo webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension redirect tab to Database Selector and Database Manager Odoo pages. 

Note: The Chrome tab must be in a Odoo server running to this extension redirect successfully.
